= Introduction =

Use this page to outline proposals for developing the *Go Bible* application. 

== Guidelines for editing this page ==

  * Please do not merely duplicate detailed enhancement issues
  * Just list major proposals for the way GoBible might be developed

== Possible projects ==
_Some of these are copied from the [http://gobible.jolon.org/news.html Go Bible News] page_
  * Rewriting Go Bible to use [http://www.j2mepolish.org/ J2ME Polish] which provides lots of nice user interface features and custom fonts 
  * A version of Go Bible written in [http://mobile.processing.org/ Mobile Processing] (this also supports custom fonts) 
  * A version of Go Bible for [http://code.google.com/android/ Android]. 
  * A version of Go Bible for the [http://developer.apple.com/iphone/ iPhone] 
  * A [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PHP PHP] script which converts source text into GoBibleDataFormat 
  * A [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graphical_user_interface GUI] for GoBibleCreator?
  * Integrate a [http://www.mountzion.org/text/DailyBibleReading.pdf Bible Reading Calendar], to read through the whole Bible in a year
